Blog.post: harlowXx everyone...haix...this week got so mani things...bad ones la...duhhh...the usual things lozz...friendship...school..either homework or whatever lame things...matters of the heart...and mani others more...and ...unfortunately...i cant get anyone whom i can talk to about this kind of things...thats the worst...lol..no choice right...u cant possibly expect me to go around orchard road or whatever road and say to a plain stranger :"heyy! i have some troubles u know! are u busy now...can i talk to u about them???" know the response? i do. "you're nuts. and a bigG pile of stupid SHIT! thats it. but. im completely sane. so no way am i gonna do it. so. now im juz gonna do nothing, sit sround at home like a stupid fool and a blur sotong.

haiX...sian le...playing gunbound...haha...dunno who to play with..so sian lorXx!! haha..waiting...and waiting. lolss. haha...er...well..i guess..i started to like ocean liao haha...the singer lozz...ou de yang...juz borrowed the disc from muh friend...his songs quite nice lozz..juz dun understand why he has to make himself an animation...i dont think he will be ugly de lozz..haha...his voice very nice..haha..paiseh liao -_-... dunno what to say le..sianzz...so much stupid homework to do...dont feel like doing..anywae who likes to do homework...siao ar..haha...stop here liao nothing alreadi...gonna wish my sis HAPPIE BIRTHHDAE!! haha...kk...go now liao...*muackxx* cya, every1..take care~!

y0 every0ne...ermmX...i juz created this bl0g...my first entry le...what t0 say ar...umm...maybe u all w0uld see that this bl0g is b0ring...hahax...cuz me juz created...s0 n0t very interesting de l0zZ...welll...ab0ut my day...t0day's 2 July, in case it d0esnt sh0w, haha...pe0ple first time d0 this kind 0f thing de mahss h0w can i kn0w haha n0t pr0 le...-_-...ermm...n0w in sch00l l0zZ...juz finish a dumb chinese pr0ject f0r h0lidaes l0zZ...but anyh0w d0 de le...but h0r...d0 can already riteX..?? hehexX..b0ring larX...and my friend jing hang suggested me creating a bl0g, juX like him...so 'fan zheng' nothing to do mahss just crea8 loX..i guess i continue next time liaos lo...dunno what to say already...my day was boring...haha...kk...----*muackxXzZ---* ...take care...bye...=P
